title: Valley Forge National Historical Park: Fossils
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Natural Features & Ecosystems     Fossils                Fossils         Fossils from Giant Sloths found at Port Kennedy in Valley Forge NHP (photo credit:Â  NPS)  Did you know that plant and animal fossils have been found at Valley Forge? It's true and this is one of the most significant deposits in the National Park System.
